lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon scored 19 points and Leilani Mitchell had 18 to help the Liberty beat the Houston Comets, 81-73. Cathrine Kraayeveld had 12 points and Janel McCarville had 10 for the Liberty (3-3), which shot 52 percent from the field — including 12 for 21 on 3-pointers.
